entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,7,1,1}{F813,0,81001}Damn me! It's the Black Samurai...!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,7,1,1}{F813,0,81001}Damn me! It's the Black Samurai...!{F801}

entry.source: 〉 Walter stared at the black suit stored{F801}in the hangar.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 Walter stared at the black suit stored{F801}in the hangar.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F813,0,81003}Pfah, my heart was racing over nothing.{F801}I thought we'd found the Black Samurai.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,81004}But it's only the shell. Its occupant,{F801}meanwhile, is nowhere to be found.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F813,0,81003}Pfah, my heart was racing over nothing.{F801}I thought we'd found the Black Samurai.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,81004}But it's only the shell. Its occupant,{F801}meanwhile, is nowhere to be found.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F813,0,81005}It's only natural you'd mistake it for{F801}the genuine article.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,81006}These do look very like the armor{F801}the Black Samurai was clad in.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,81007}Certainly it hadn't occurred to me{F801}that it would be so commonly found...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F813,0,81005}It's only natural you'd mistake it for{F801}the genuine article.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,81006}These do look very like the armor{F801}the Black Samurai was clad in.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,81007}Certainly it hadn't occurred to me{F801}that it would be so commonly found...{F801}
